005import java.util.function.UnaryOperator;

008import com.commercetools.api.models.discount_code.DiscountCode;

012import com.commercetools.api.models.discount_code.DiscountCodeUpdateAction;
013import com.commercetools.api.models.discount_code.DiscountCodeUpdateActionBuilder;
014
015public interface ByProjectKeyDiscountCodesRequestBuilderMixin {
016    public ByProjectKeyDiscountCodesByIDRequestBuilder withId(String ID);
017
018    public ByProjectKeyDiscountCodesPost post(DiscountCodeDraft discountCodeDraft);
019
020    public default ByProjectKeyDiscountCodesByIDPost update(Versioned<DiscountCode> discountCode,
021            List<DiscountCodeUpdateAction> actions) {
022        return withId(discountCode.getId())
023                .post(builder -> DiscountCodeUpdate.builder().version(discountCode.getVersion()).actions(actions));
024    }
025
026    public default ByProjectKeyDiscountCodesByIDPost update(Versioned<DiscountCode> discountCode,
027            UnaryOperator<UpdateActionBuilder<DiscountCodeUpdateAction, DiscountCodeUpdateActionBuilder>> op) {
028        return withId(discountCode.getId()).post(builder -> DiscountCodeUpdate.builder()
029                .version(discountCode.getVersion())
030                .actions(op.apply(UpdateActionBuilder.of(DiscountCodeUpdateActionBuilder::of)).actions));
031    }
032
033    public default WithUpdateActionBuilder<DiscountCodeUpdateAction, DiscountCodeUpdateActionBuilder, ByProjectKeyDiscountCodesByIDPost> update(
034            Versioned<DiscountCode> discountCode) {
035        return builder -> withId(discountCode.getId()).post(b -> DiscountCodeUpdate.builder()
036                .version(discountCode.getVersion())
037                .actions(builder.apply(UpdateActionBuilder.of(DiscountCodeUpdateActionBuilder::of)).actions));
038    }
039
040    public default ByProjectKeyDiscountCodesByIDDelete delete(Versioned<DiscountCode> discountCode) {
041        return withId(discountCode.getId()).delete().withVersion(discountCode.getVersion());
042    }
043
044    public default ByProjectKeyDiscountCodesPost create(DiscountCodeDraft discountCodeDraft) {
045        return post(discountCodeDraft);
046    }
047
048    public default ByProjectKeyDiscountCodesPost create(UnaryOperator<DiscountCodeDraftBuilder> op) {
049        return post(op.apply(DiscountCodeDraftBuilder.of()).build());
050    }
051}
